title: If SRAS slopes up, increased AD causes inflation

content.prompt: If the short-run aggregate supply curve is upward sloping, which of the following will cause inflation?

choices.label: A decrease in aggregate demand and an increase in aggregate supply

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run
